name: Nucleus
description: Bighead managed to get us a sample of a file compressed with nucleus. Unfortunately that big head of his is only good for building potato cannons so he accidentally provided us with a corrupted version of the uncompressed file. Reverse engineer nucleus and retrieve the uncompressed file. Nucleus is hosted at: play.iwanttoplayaga.me:1347. TL;DR: You have corrupted original and compressed original. Find original.
